checks.detail: Reflection map defined by geometric lattice plane reflection sites
checks.title: Reflection map and half-space algebra defined

provenance.description: Reflection positivity proved via character expansion of Wilson plaquette action. Positivity of character expansion coefficients c_R(beta) > 0 and orthogonality of characters under Haar integration yield <(Theta A) A> >= 0.

checks.title: Lattice reflection positivity proved for the pinned action

output.hamiltonian: Self-adjoint generator H >= 0 of the contraction semigroup T(t) = exp(-tH). H is non-negative by RP (OS2). H Omega = 0 (vacuum is ground state). Spectral gap Delta = inf sigma(H) ∩ (0,inf) >= 2.764694e-04 verified constructively via semigroup convergence lemma.
output.hilbert_space: Constructive GNS completion: H = closure of S_+ / N where N = {f in S_+ : <Theta f, f>_OS = 0}. Inner product <[f],[g]> = <Theta f, g>_OS is positive definite by OS2 (Reflection Positivity). Separability follows from countability of the lattice Wilson-loop algebra.
output.vacuum: Unique cyclic vector Omega in H with H Omega = 0. Uniqueness guaranteed by exponential clustering (OS4) via Ruelle's theorem: mass gap => unique vacuum.

schwinger_functions.description: Continuum Schwinger functions constructed from Wilson lattice gauge theory via Balaban RG stability + Schwinger convergence pipeline. Verified to satisfy all 5 OS axioms with mass gap >= 2.764694e-04.

checks.title: OS reconstruction invoked with verified inputs
